body_html:
a minimal BUILD for this one is something like below. Note that lite:framework is not enough

load("//tensorflow:tensorflow.bzl", "tf_cc_binary")

tf_cc_binary(
    name = "minimal",
    srcs = [
        "minimal.cc",
    ],
    deps = [
        "//tensorflow/contrib/lite:framework",
        "//tensorflow/contrib/lite/kernels:builtin_ops",
    ],
)
body_text:
a minimal BUILD for this one is something like below. Note that lite:framework is not enough
load("//tensorflow:tensorflow.bzl", "tf_cc_binary")

tf_cc_binary(
    name = "minimal",
    srcs = [
        "minimal.cc",
    ],
    deps = [
        "//tensorflow/contrib/lite:framework",
        "//tensorflow/contrib/lite/kernels:builtin_ops",
    ],
)
body:
a minimal `BUILD` for this one is something like below. Note that `lite:framework` is not enough

```
load("//tensorflow:tensorflow.bzl", "tf_cc_binary")

tf_cc_binary(
    name = "minimal",
    srcs = [
        "minimal.cc",
    ],
    deps = [
        "//tensorflow/contrib/lite:framework",
        "//tensorflow/contrib/lite/kernels:builtin_ops",
    ],
)
```
